notesStmt.note: A folio from a collection of numbered recipes for pharmaceutical elixirs, classified by their main ingredient. This folio contains no. 33, from a plant called לשון השור(bull's tounge); לשון הטלה ,34 (ewe's tounge), 35, אלטכנגבין a complex elixer; sporadic vocalization.
